squidpony.squidai

Class Threat

  • java.lang.Object
    • squidpony.squidai.Threat
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class Threat
extends Object
implements Serializable
    A small class to store the area that a creature is perceived by other creatures to threaten. Created by Tommy Ettinger on 11/8/2015.
    See Also:
